text:
February 22, \9$$
Hr* Robert A. Scothom
K&9S Sandal Lane
Los Angeles 2k, California
Dear Mr, Scothom:
I*m sorxy that we do not have funds for support of publication
projects other than those agreed to in advance or commissioned.
If it were possible for you to send an advance copy of your study (or
adequate outline) to Mr, Janes Idles, Chairman of our Publications
Committee, Radio Station WBAA, Purdue University, Lafayette, Indiana,
and Mr, Robert Coleman, Chairman of the NAEB Research Committee,
Radio Station WKAR, Michigan State College, East Lansing, Michigan,
I should be glad to have their recommendations, however.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJSswc
cct Mr, Miles (with letter)
Mr. Coleman
